data.title: Movie Screening & Discussion - "The Unholy Wife"
data.meta_description: (In Person Only) Join Marcus Renna for a screening and discussion of the 1957 film noir "The Unholy Wife" starring Diana Dors, Rod Steiger, and Tom Tryon. Never released on DVD!
data.text:
(In Person Only)

Join Marcus Renna for a screening and discussion of the 1957 film noir "The Unholy Wife" starring Diana Dors, Rod Steiger, and Tom Tryon. Never released on DVD!

A gold-digger floozy marries a wealthy wine producer but she secretly takes a young lover with whom she conspires to murder her husband for his fortune.
